price: When Our verses are recited to him, he says, “Ancient fables[2]!”
arabic: إِذَا تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡهِ ءَايَٰتُنَا قَالَ أَسَٰطِيرُ ٱلۡأَوَّلِينَ
footnotes: [2] i.e., tales of old times, legends of former peoples.
